willowdale_village.description: A small farming village nestled in a valley, known for its annual harvest festival

darkwood_forest.description: A dense forest where sunlight barely penetrates the canopy. Locals avoid it after dark.

mountain_pass.description: A treacherous path through the Ironspine Mountains, the only route to the northern territories

river_bend.description: Where the Silverrun River curves sharply, creating calm pools popular with fishermen
